mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure images and text scale properly on smaller devices to avoid horizontal scrolling.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and consider lazy loading for non-essential assets to improve load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions, use header tags properly, and include more local SEO keywords to enhance visibility.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation by consolidating related sections to reduce clicks and improve user flow.
tips: Consider adding live chat support for immediate customer inquiries.
Integrate more customer reviews to build trust with potential visitors.
